alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fairfield, north central Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Longtown, or near Lake Wateree Dam, moving northeast at 10 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden, Lake Wateree Dam, Lugoff, Elgin, Goodale State Park, Longtown, Pine Grove Fire Station, Dekalb, North Towne Square Shopping Center, Woodward Airfield and Lake Wateree near Highway 97. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 93 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
